issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: The problem isn't valid and it can't be fixed.
resolution.name: Invalid

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
We are getting lots of exceptions as below:

0000010732: 172.17.2.19: Jul 27 2017 23:23:16.088 +0800:
%_DemandForwardingBridgeSupport-4-org.apache.activemq.network.DemandForwardingBridgeSupport:
{Thrd=ActiveMQ InactivityMonitor Worker}  Network
connection between vm://MmcaJmsBroker-callcontrol-Evs06ms01#9956 and tcp://localhost/127.0.0.1:61619@46727 shutdown
due to a remote error: org.apache.activemq.transport.InactivityIOException: Channel
was inactive for too (>30000) long: tcp://127.0.0.1:61619

0000010730: 172.17.2.19: Jul 27 2017 23:23:16.087 +0800:
%_Transport-4-org.apache.activemq.broker.TransportConnection.Transport:
{Thrd=ActiveMQ InactivityMonitor Worker}  Transport Connection to:
tcp://127.0.0.1:39000 failed:
org.apache.activemq.transport.InactivityIOException: Channel was inactive for
too (>30000) long: tcp://127.0.0.1:39000

0000010735: 172.17.2.19: Jul 27 2017 23:23:16.241 +0800:
%_DemandForwardingBridgeSupport-4-org.apache.activemq.network.DemandForwardingBridgeSupport:
{Thrd=ActiveMQ Transport: tcp://localhost/127.0.0.1:61614@37020}  Network
connection between vm://MmcaJmsBroker-callcontrol-Evs06ms01#9972 and tcp://localhost/127.0.0.1:61614@37020 shutdown
due to a remote error: javax.jms.InvalidClientIDException: Broker:
MmcaJmsBroker-oraadmin-Evs06ms01 - Client: static://(tcp://localhost:61614?socket.tcpNoDelay=true)_MmcaJmsBroker-callcontrol-Evs06ms01_outbound
already connected from tcp://127.0.0.1:35686

0000010737: 172.17.2.19: Jul 27 2017 23:23:16.262 +0800:
%_DemandForwardingBridgeSupport-4-org.apache.activemq.network.DemandForwardingBridgeSupport:
{Thrd=ActiveMQ Transport: tcp://localhost/127.0.0.1:61619@48255}  Network
connection between vm://MmcaJmsBroker-callcontrol-Evs06ms01#9974 and
tcp://localhost/127.0.0.1:61619@48255 shutdown due to a remote
error: java.lang.IllegalStateException: Cannot add a producer to a
connection that had not been registered:
ID:Evs06ms01-44429-1500270749477-4988:1

javax.jms.InvalidClientIDException: Broker:
MmcaJmsBroker-callcontrol-Evs06ms01 - Client:
static://(tcp://localhost:61612?socket.tcpNoDelay=true)_MmcaJmsBroker-ora-Evs06ms01_outbound
already connected from tcp://127.0.0.1:39015

                       
at
org.apache.activemq.broker.region.RegionBroker.addConnection(RegionBroker.java:223)

                       
at org.apache.activemq.broker.BrokerFilter.addConnection(BrokerFilter.java:85)

                       
at
org.apache.activemq.advisory.AdvisoryBroker.addConnection(AdvisoryBroker.java:79)

                       
at org.apache.activemq.broker.BrokerFilter.addConnection(BrokerFilter.java:85)

                       
at org.apache.activemq.broker.BrokerFilter.addConnection(BrokerFilter.java:85)

                       
at
org.apache.activemq.broker.MutableBrokerFilter.addConnection(MutableBrokerFilter.java:91)

                       
at org.apache.activemq.broker.TransportConnection.processAddConnection(TransportConnection.java:712)

                       
at
org.apache.activemq.broker.jmx.ManagedTransportConnection.processAddConnection(ManagedTransportConnection.java:80)

                       
at org.apache.activemq.command.ConnectionInfo.visit(ConnectionInfo.java:139)

                       
at
org.apache.activemq.broker.TransportConnection.service(TransportConnection.java:294)

                       
at org.apache.activemq.broker.TransportConnection$1.onCommand(TransportConnection.java:152)

                       
at
org.apache.activemq.transport.MutexTransport.onCommand(MutexTransport.java:50)

                       
at
org.apache.activemq.transport.WireFormatNegotiator.onCommand(WireFormatNegotiator.java:113)

                       
at
org.apache.activemq.transport.AbstractInactivityMonitor.onCommand(AbstractInactivityMonitor.java:256)

                       
at
org.apache.activemq.transport.TransportSupport.doConsume(TransportSupport.java:83)

                       
at org.apache.activemq.transport.tcp.TcpTransport.doRun(TcpTransport.java:222)

                       
at org.apache.activemq.transport.tcp.TcpTransport.run(TcpTransport.java:204)

                       
at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:745)
fields.summary: Getting exceptions shutdown due to a remote error: org.apache.activemq.transport.InactivityIOException: Channel was inactive for too

comments.body:
The broker version is old, recommend updating to a recent release.

For support questions please ask on the uses mailing list.
May I know the procedure to contact user mailing lists ?
May I know the procedure to contact user mailing lists?

A simple Google search will answer your question, the information is on the ActiveMQ website:
http://activemq.apache.org/discussion-forums.html
